name: Muesliikon Original SAMPLE PACK
description: Enjoy the ability of sampling our delicious Muesliikon "Original" pack. This is for people who are allergic to almonds, walnuts or individuals who would like to control the amount of nuts inside our muesli.  It is tasty, chewy, crunchy and contains Whole grains, Quinoa, Flax seeds, Chia seeds, Pumpkin seeds,Kamut, Raisins, Rolled oats, Sucanat natural dried cane juice.

name: Muesliikon Vigor SAMPLE PACK
description: Enjoy the ability of sampling our delicious Muesliikon VIGOR pack. Made with a variety of whole grains, nuts and seeds. It is tasty, chewy, crunchy and contains Whole grains, Quinoa, Flax seeds, Chia seeds, Pumpkin seeds,Kamut, Raisins, Rolled oats, Sucanat natural dried cane juice, Almonds & Walnut. Just like the other brands, this is unique to any other muesli product whether it is taste, content or texture. Vigor can be eaten with fresh fruits of your choice, you can use milk (hot or cold) or cold apple juice to eat Muesli-iKon Vigor!

name: Muesli-iKon Original Mix de Cocoa
description: Original de Cocoa: Enjoy the rich chocolate flavor of a delicious whole grain muesli without worrying about nut allergies or a larger waistline.This delicious option is made with a variety of whole grain, raisins, unrefined cocoa but NO NUTS. this is unique to any other muesli product whether it is taste, content or texture. Original de cocoa can be eaten with fresh fruits of your choice, you can use milk (hot or cold) or cold apple juice to eat Muesli-iKon Original de cocoa!

name: Muesli-iKon Original Mix
description: Here is another Best Seller for our customers allergic to tree nuts (almonds,walnut) or those customers would like to try our product other than with nuts. Original Mix can be eaten with fresh fruits of your choice, you can use milk (hot or cold) or cold apple juice to eat Muesli-iKon Original Mix!

name: Muesli-iKon Vigor de Cocoa
description: If you love Vigor and you love chocolate, then Vigor de Cocoa is for you. Enjoy the same taste of our Best Seller with a hint of healthy unrefined cocoa. it is tasty, chewy, crunchy and contains Whole grains, Quinoa,Flax seeds, Chia seeds,Spelt,Kamut,Wheat bran, Raisins, Rolled oats, Rye, Sucanat natural dried cane juice, Almonds & Walnut. Just like the other brands, this is unique to any other muesli product whether it is taste, content or texture.
